alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 17 at 1:17PM MST until June 17 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern and western Coconino County including the locations of Flagstaff, Doney Park, Williams, Munds Park, Jacob Lake, Fredonia, Grand Canyon Village, Supai, North Rim, and Valle. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim
